reasons.item-list.1.content.message: It is Open-Source and free to use. Sumé LMS is licensed by Apache 2.0. It means that you can download, host, and use it.

reasons.item-list.2.content.message: Designed by people to people, to understand his needs and desires for a better experience.

reasons.item-list.3.content.message: It uses K8s, Container, React and Go. All the cool kids on the block are here.

reasons.item-list.4.content.message: The application structure allows you to design and use micro-services.

reasons.item-list.5.content.message: All knowledge developed by people must be owned by people.

reasons.item-list.6.content.message: SCORM and xAPI were supported. But you should try to use Guaraná.

features.item-list.1.description.message: You can customize it and get access to the courses based on your interest. While you learn, the platform will also learn and adapt to help you to get the best results. The student space is the perfect place to improve the way that you learn while you follow your progress and get in touch with the instructor and other students.

features.item-list.2.description.message: The control of the content is in your hands. Get statistics about the student progress, and course statistics. Find out how to improve the way that your content is delivered to the students while you plan your course or next class.

features.item-list.3.description.message: Distribute knowledge is part of your business, and your organization can have multiple spaces to learn, collaborate, and share. Manage multiple learning spaces, and help your collaborators or students in their learning journey.

homepage.banner.subtitle.message: A fast and modern e-learning platform designed for humans.

homepage.banner.button-github.description: Homepage banner button to visit github

homepage.section.install.subtitle.message: Some of our guides to help you to install.

homepage.section.community.text.1.message: Together we can build a better future. Join us and help us to develop the future of the e-learning application.

homepage.section.community.text.2.message: We are looking for great minds that want to help us to develop the best experience for everybody. Join us as a developer, designer, content creator, student, or educator.

theme.NotFound.p1.message: We could not find what you were looking for.
theme.NotFound.p1.description: The first paragraph of the 404 page

theme.NotFound.p2.message: Please contact the owner of the site that linked you to the original URL and let them know their link is broken.
